pregunta_satisfaccion: On a scale of one to five, how was the tour?
pregunta_camino: How was the route during the tour?
pregunta_recomendacion: Would you recommend this tour to others?
pregunta_transporte: How was your experience with the transportation?
pregunta_costo: How would you rate the cost of the tour?
pregunta_opinion: In what areas do you think we could improve?

problema_opinion: There was a problem sending the feedback. Please try again.
